entities.name: CENTRAL BANK OF BRAZIL
entities.description: The Central Bank of Brazil is the central monetary authority in Brazil, responsible for overseeing financial and monetary policy, including exchange control reporting.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is a non-Canadian company involved in the administration and operation of the Plan, allowing participants to acquire shares of Common Stock.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company provides a plan that requires asset and rights reporting to the Central Bank of Brazil if thresholds are met.
